blurb: This team is dedicated for fast case turnover without any compromise in quality. Choose EXCEL for posterior crowns, simple restorations that require efficiency in time, and value.

Team that specializes for more complex cases including anterior restorations and smile makeover cases. Choose MARVEL for cases where we aim for higher quality. Time is what they need for maximum performance.

FASCINA team is formed due to high demand of quality works. The members of FASCINA team are carefully picked by our Chief Technician Officer to ensure their work are as close as possible to nature. Their passion and experience are build upon thousands of cases.
Team that exist to make sure that all communication, investigation, and logistic go well and comfortable with our clients. Their main value of service is: Helpful Their attitude: Humble
With the support of our clients, we are now exist in Bali and Jakarta to support efficiency of case turnover and logistics
And our latest branch is located in the heart of Indonesia, Jakarta

Handled by the Chief Technician of Zirmon Dental Atelier alone. dr Kelvin Tantono as the founder of Zirmon Dental Atelier has proved his love for dental restorations by attending several trainings abroad and share his expertise in several trainings and seminars. MAGNI is a very personalized type of work without intervention of any other hands except the hands of dr Kelvin Tantono. When enjoying his love for dental restorations, dr Kelvin demand patience because he believes that we can buy qualit
